contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} [[File:Flag of Montserrat.svg|thumb|250px|right|[[File:FIAV 110010.svg|23px]] Flag ratio: 1:2]] [[File:Flag of the Governor of Montserrat.svg|thumb|250px|Flag of the Governor of Montserrat]] The '''Flag of [[Montserrat]]''' was adopted on 10 April 1909. ==Flag features== It is a [[Blue Ensign]] with the [[Union Flag]] in the [[canton (flag)|canton]] and the [[Coat of arms of Montserrat]] in the fly. ===Symbolism of arms=== The arms feature [[Erin]], the female personification of [[Ireland]], and the golden harp, another symbol of Ireland. This reflects the colony's Irish ancestry. ==Flag of the Governor== The [[Governor of Montserrat]] maintains a separate flag. The Governor's flag consists of a [[Union Flag]] defaced with the coat of arms. ==See also== * [[List of flags of the United Kingdom]] * [[Coat of arms of Montserrat]] {{British dependencies flags}} {{Flags of North America}} {{Union Flag}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Montserrat, Flag of}} [[Category:Montserratian culture|Flag]] [[Category:National flags]] [[Category:Blue Ensigns]] [[Category:Flags of British Overseas Territories]] [[Category:1909 introductions]] {{Caribbean-flag-stub}} {{Montserrat-stub}}
